jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek is the fastest growing startup in South East Asia. Having started off as a ride hailing company, it rapidly added food delivery, payment, logistics and lifestyle services on the back of 2 million+ driver partners and 300,000+ merchants

GoSend and GoBox form a part of the logistics suite of products and are the preferred provider of on-demand logistics in Indonesia delivering over 300,000 packages per day. One of the focus areas for Logistics this year is to provide a delightful and seamless user experience for users of GoSend and GoBox by revamping the user booking experience. Another key area of focus is to provide first-mile and last-mile solutions as a third party logistics(3PL) provider for other businesses including SMEs.

GoSend and GoBox form a part of the logistics suite of products and are the preferred provider of on-demand logistics in Indonesia delivering over 300,000 packages per day. jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• As part of the product team, contribute to the test strategy, automation and execution on the prioritized roadmap for your product area
  • Work with developers and designers to ship features and product improvements while inculcating a quality culture
  • Perform test design, selection, prioritization for new and upcoming features and automate the testing on UI/API/Integration layers and non functional aspects like security, accessibility, performance
  • Work on mobile platforms (IOS, Android) for our consumer and driver facing apps along with automation using Appium/Native frameworks with a Java/Kotin based test automation framework and scripting with Python
  • Work with backend dev team to review code changes and create a robust automation suite covering functional, integration, contract testing aspects
  • Learn everything you can about our customers through data and analytic events and use it to drive your product decisions

• B.Tech/BCA or M.Tech/MCA degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 4+ years of experience working as a SDET/Quality engineer, ideally working on consumer-facing, large-scale products
  • A fast learner, you’re comfortable teaching yourself new skills and can thrive in a complex and fast-paced environment
  • Analytical and data-driven, you love digging into the data/product to understand what’s happening and define & measure the appropriate level of testing to be done to have a quality product
  • Passionate about improving testing and automation coverage by innovative solutions and well crafted code
  • Code freely in Java and have experience with test frameworks like BDD/TestNG/Junit and reporting frameworks
  • Able to critically think about requirements and use cases and having a growth mindset towards your work
  • Experience in working with Kotlin/Python/Go languages to create test frameworks is highly desirable
